ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from saving records with Payment Type = Late Payment and a PAC Warranty Record Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name='PAC Warranty Record Type', NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')), ISPICKVAL(Payment_Type__c,'Late Payment') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Payment Type cannot equal Late Payment for records with the PAC Warranty Record Type.
